Terms.Name: None/thin
Terms.Description: This planet is airless, or it's atmosphere is so thin as to be useless for humans.

Terms.Name: Toxic
Terms.Description: This planet's atmosphere is not compatible with human life. Exploring this place will require a sealed environment or breathing apparatus. Otherwise, survival is measured in minutes.

Terms.Name: Corrosive
Terms.Description: This planet's atmosphere is deadly to humans. As a bonus, it can damage exposed skin, materials, plastics, and metals over time.

Terms.Name: Marginal
Terms.Description: It's unhealthy to breathe this planet's atmosphere for more than a few hours at a time.

Terms.Name: Breathable
Terms.Description: This atmosphere is not perfect, but it's good enough to sustain human life.

Terms.Name: Ideal
Terms.Description: This planet's atmosphere is ideally suited to human life. It's literally a breath of fresh air.
